p: Deficiency of nitrogen (N) is a general approach to start the storage of lipid in most oleaginous microorganisms. Investigation of lipid accumulation is frequently carried out by comparing the N rich phase to the N deficiency phase in the whole culture time, and the quantity of lipid enhances under N depletion [ 30, 31, 32]. The maximum concentration of TFAs is 15% in CBS 277.49 [ 16]. Similar trends and results were observed in the experiments of this study. Recombination and expression of D15D gene showed no significant effect on growth or total lipid content of this fungus.
